name: Supercar Drift
description:
Super Cars Drifting
Bored of playing old drifting games with boring cars??? Download and play New Super Cars Drifting game exclusively available now on Steam. This Drifting Game is different from all other games as you play with all new concept cars like DEMON, SPEEDX, ROADRUNNER, BLACKHAWK, REAPER, GLADIATOR, MAXIMUS, RAMBO, WICKED WITCH, STORM CHASER, WAR HAMMER. Also with new challenges.
Have a brand new thrilling drift experience by playing with these supercars. Moreover, awesome gameplay. Realistic music and in-game sound. Super Cars Drifting have 5 different tracks to play. New challenges on track and much more.
5 different tracks to play (REGULAR TRACK, CITY NIGHT THEME, DESERT THEME TRACK, SNOW THEME, RAIN THEME)
 Complete one track to unlock the next track. If you are a stunt freak use ramps on tracks and showoff some crazy stunts.
 Drift all your way and earn coins. Use these coins to buy cars with excellent controls, sensibility & physics. You have to beat the timer and reach the finish point and make your high score.
Control your drifting car like a professional drifter and avoid driving the wrong way.
 
SUPERCARS DRIFTING GAME FEATURES:
11 Different Cars
5 Different Tracks
Awesome Gameplays With Realistic Sounds and Graphics
Reverse Timer 
Slowmo effects
Stunt Ramps
Stunning Night Theme in Track 2
